item.title: March 2015 Updates
item.description: Latest updates to the ENSAT registry including: notification features, membership access upgrade, several bug-fixes and three new study protocols.

item.title: August 2014 Updates
item.description: Latest updates to the ENSAT registry including: various security enhancements and code efficiency upgrades.

item.title: July 2014 Updates
item.description: Latest updates to the ENSAT registry including: transfer function from NAPACA can be accessed from main detail page, ADIUVO presence, specific hormonal values and presence of complicating conditions.

item.title: June 2014 Updates
item.description: Latest updates to the ENSAT registry including: the MAPP-Prono study (with many additional data points in pheo), additional points to the EURINE-ACT export, a new connection between search and export, bugs fixed in pheo follow-up and the NAPACA to PMT transfer function.
